actions.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment specifies that the functions of the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs should place an emphasis on minimizing the burden on small businessess with 50 or fewer employees.
purpose: An amendment to specify that the functions of the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs should place an emphasis on minimizing the burden on small businessess with 50 or fewer employees.
